HOME.title-test: Test to Discover Your Skin Type
HOME.test-description: Do you want to know which of the four skin types is yours and the best routine for perfect skin? Take our simple test and find out.
HOME.test-first-step: Wash your face with a gentle cleanser and wait 15 to 30 minutes.
HOME.test-second-step: During this time, do not apply any products.
HOME.test-third-step: Determine your skin type based on the characteristics you observe.
